**2023-07-12 / @adonovan, @bradfitz, @ianlancetaylor, @rsc**

**Discussions (not yet proposals)**

- **codereview: should the Go project stop importing GitHub PRs?** [#61182](https://go.dev/issue/61182)
- **math/rand/v2: a new API for math/rand and a first v2 for std** [#60751](https://go.dev/issue/60751)
- **net/http: add methods and path variables to ServeMux patterns** [#60227](https://go.dev/issue/60227)
- **net/http: move HTTP/2 into the standard library** [#60746](https://go.dev/issue/60746)

**Accepted**

- **all: add GOARM64=v8.1 and so on** [#60905](https://go.dev/issue/60905)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **go/types: add Package.GoVersion method** [#61175](https://go.dev/issue/61175)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **log/slog:  change XXXCtx function names to XXXContext** [#61200](https://go.dev/issue/61200)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **runtime: change mutex profile to scale contention by number of blocked goroutines** [#61015](https://go.dev/issue/61015)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **runtime: enforce standard descriptors are open on initialization** [#60641](https://go.dev/issue/60641)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **unsafe: allow conversion of uintptr to unsafe.Pointer when it points to non-Go memory** [#58625](https://go.dev/issue/58625)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/tools/go/analysis: add Config.GoVersion field** [#61176](https://go.dev/issue/61176)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **hash: make the Sum method less confusing** [#21070](https://go.dev/issue/21070)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **io: require io.Reader to return either n > 0 or an error** [#27531](https://go.dev/issue/27531)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **sync: remove the Cond type** [#21165](https://go.dev/issue/21165)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
